Disney Streaming Services | New York, NY | Software Engineer: Marketing Tech Engineering| Full time

The Marketing Tech Engineering team is responsible for powering all marketing initiatives for Disney Streaming Services, including ESPN+ and Disney+. We develop and leverage software to make sure Disney Streaming Services marketing teams are able to grow and retain customers both domestically and internationally.

You'll be working with a team that pushes the envelope of serverless computing using services and technology like AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, Kinesis Streams and Firehose, Glue and Spark. Experience with Java, building microservices, stream processing and ETL preferred.

PM me to apply.
